It may not be currently obtainable. Players cannot obtain this item in the live game.

Item ID22610

Vesta's spear is a 2-handed weapon exclusive to the original Deadman Mode and Deadman Seasonals, requiring 78 Attack to wield. It is part of Vesta's equipment, a set of Ancient Warriors' equipment, and is dropped by any monster found in the Wilderness as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the combat level of the monster.

BlockStabDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing Vesta's spear's special attack.

Vesta's spear has a special attack, Spear Wall, that consumes 50% of the player's special attack energy and damages up to 16 targets within 8 tiles surrounding the player (one if the player is outside a multicombat area).

In addition, the user becomes immune to melee attacks for 8 ticks (4.8 seconds).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Ancient Warriors' equipment were originally added in a 2008 update, a year after the backup of Old School RuneScape.
  • Unlike its original incarnation, it does not degrade.

[[File:Vesta's spear detail.png|150px|left]]
'''Vesta's spear''' is a 2-handed weapon exclusive to the original [[Deadman Mode]] and Deadman Seasonals, requiring 78 [[Attack]] to wield. It is part of [[Vesta's equipment]], a set of [[Ancient Warriors' equipment]], and is dropped by any monster found in the [[Wilderness]] as part of a global loot table, the chance being relative to the [[combat level]] of the monster.

==Combat styles==
{{CombatStyles|Spear}}

==Special attack==
[[File:Spear Wall.gif|thumb|250px|A player performing Vesta's spear's special attack.]]
Vesta's spear has a [[special attack]], ''Spear Wall'', that consumes 50% of the player's [[special attack energy]] and damages up to 16 targets within 8 tiles surrounding the player (one if the player is outside a [[multicombat area]]).

In addition, the user becomes immune to melee attacks for 8 ticks (4.8 seconds).

==Trivia==
*[[Ancient Warriors' equipment]] were originally added in a 2008 {{RSL|Update:PvP Worlds|update}}, a year after the backup of ''Old School RuneScape''.
*Unlike its {{RSL|Vesta's spear|original incarnation}}, it does not degrade.
